Title: My Perfect Romance
Writer: Stella Bagwell (Based on the novel "Fortune's Perfect Valentine" by), Amanda McNeice
Actors: Lauren Holly, Morgan Fairchild, Jodie Sweetin, Christopher Russell
Plot: Newly appointed CEO of Robinson Tech, Wes Robinson, is looking for new ideas to boost the company's sales. Vivian Blair, a program developer, shares a dating algorithm she has been working ...
